title: :: General James Mattiss insulted the anti-war demonstrators
subtitle: A quote calling the protestors against the war "cowards" currently attributed to the Navy soldier General James Matisse was the first to be alleged to be General Tommy Franks in the army.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Minister of Defence chosen by Tramp, James Matisse, called the protestors against the war "cowards."
